sense.name: Be excessively hot; figuratively cooking; be damaged by a heat source.
sense.examples: If the children stay out on the beach for another hour, they will fry. My scalp was fried by the lightning strike.

sense.name: Cook on a hot surface using fat; cook in oil.
sense.examples: We fried potato pancakes over the weekend. Fry the vegetables in oil. Shrimp should fry for only a few minutes.

sense.name: Kill by electrocution, as in the electric chair.
sense.examples: They fried the serial killer yesterday as his family watched on. He's gonna fry!
